enryo.en: to be reserved, to be restrained

irassharu.en: (respectful) to be,to come or to go

kureru.en: to get dark,to come to an end

futsuu.en: usually, or a train that stops at every station

norikaeru.en: to change between buses or trains

chittomo.en: not at all (used with a negative verb)

zenzen.en: not entirely (used in a negative sentence)

ukeru.en: to take a lesson or test

omimai.en: calling on someone who is ill,enquiry

waku.en: to boil, to grow hot,to get excited

tokkyuu.en: limited express train (faster than an express train)
